entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
